scripts.graphile: npx postgraphile --subscriptions --watch --dynamic-json --no-setof-functions-contain-nulls --no-ignore-rbac --no-ignore-indexes --show-error-stack=json --extended-errors hint,detail,errcode --append-plugins @graphile-contrib/pg-simplify-inflector --export-schema-graphql schema.graphql --graphiql '/' --enhance-graphiql --allow-explain --enable-query-batching --legacy-relations omit --connection postgres://postgres:mysecretpassword@members-postgres-1.dev.dock/wolbodo --schema public
